DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of levofloxacin to prevent bacterial infections in the postneutropenic period in patients who have undergone allogeneic stem cell transplantation (SCT).
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Levofloxacin as Prophylaxis After Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation (SCT)
DOC.criteria: Allogeneic SCT Postneutropenic period Written consent Fever Antibiotic therapy Neutropenia Refusal by the patient
